title: Server lags
body:
Hello,

I had a match just now, where in the middle I was disconnected from server. In the [match history](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/137145333/200688457) you can see my first death, it's when the lags started. Two minutes after my second death is when lags ended. During the whole time I could connect to the rest of the internet (Google, Steam, etc.) and my teammates were not affected by the lags.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you experienced this issue since?

From your description it sounds like this was a problem on your or your ISP's end of things.
